input.issue: Analyze capabilities of Kubernetes resource: ClusterEphemeralReport

output:
{
  "capabilities": [
    "policy compliance reporting",
    "rule-level results (pass/fail/warn/error)",
    "severity classification (critical/high/medium/low)",
    "results aggregation and summary counts",
    "per-resource findings with object references",
    "resource selection via label/expressions selector",
    "timestamped findings",
    "message/category/properties metadata",
    "owner-bound report lifecycle"
  ],
  "providers": ["kyverno", "kubernetes"],
  "abstractions": [
    "policy report CRD",
    "compliance summary aggregation",
    "severity-based classification",
    "owner-scoped lifecycle management",
    "resource targeting via selectors"
  ],
  "complexity": "low",
  "description": "Cluster-scoped ephemeral report for recording and summarizing policy evaluation results, categorized by severity and status, and linked to an owning resource.",
  "useCase": "Generate and aggregate cluster-wide policy evaluation results for selected resources and policies with timestamps and severity.",
  "confidence": 0.86
}
